channel.title: Custom items go in weapon slot [PI]
channel.description:
I've tried adding the TokHaar-Kal to my rsps, when I try to wear the tokhaar-kal it just goes in the weapon slot instead of the cape slot... I've tried editing item.java to fix this problem but it still goes in the weapon slot.
[size=10pt][b]I've found out how to fix the problem now![/b][/size]

item.title: Custom items go in weapon slot [PI]
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

Add a specific case in the wearItem method in ItemAssistant.java.

like;

[code]switch(wearId) {

case ###:
targetSlot = 3;
}
[/code]

I’m not sure if those are the correct Integers since I don’t have the file open.

Read full topic
item.source: Custom items go in weapon slot [PI]
